definitions: make familiar with and at ease in many different countries and cultures

examples.text: a time when the colleges and universities of America were flooded with students cosmopolitanized to a degree by their war experiences

shortDefinitions: make familiar with and at ease in many different countries and cultures

definitions: change (something) in such a way that it becomes composed of people or elements from many different countries or cultures

examples.text: transnational states that have been cosmopolitanized

shortDefinitions: change something so that it becomes composed of people or elements from different countries or cultures
